name: Gamble Royale
description:
Just how powerful are you? Roll the dice to find out!

Background: 

The main character is a Gambler who's been found to be Card Counting by the staff. They've thrown him in the basement in order to deal with him at a later point however they did not anticipate that he is a skilled marksman who can break out.

Within Gable Royale, the difficulty ramps up and down constantly depending on what you roll the 2 dice on.

The higher the number on the Blue Dice, the more it benefits the player. The higher the number on the Red Dice, the more it benefits the enemies!

Controls:

WASD/Left Joystick to move

Move the Mouse/Right Joystick to aim more precisely

HOLD Left Click/Right Trigger to shoot/attack

Credits:
